content: That's really helpful, thank you! I think I'll try to batch similar activities together and set realistic goals for my evening routine. I also want to make sure I leave some time for relaxation and unwinding. Speaking of relaxation, I've been trying to reduce my screen time before bed, but I still find myself checking my phone for at least 10-15 minutes before falling asleep. Do you have any tips on how to break this habit and establish a better pre-bedtime routine?
